<!-- Source: 1.1 BRCGS  Policy Statement 2025 Rev 12.docx -->
<!-- Conversion Date: 2025-09-30 16:05:22 -->

**Vision**

**Kangopak’s** Product Safety and Quality Management System is based on the BRCGS Global Standard for Packaging (BRCGS). We strive to become a supplier of choice for Stand-up Pouches (Doypack), Flat Pouches, Flat Bottom, Folded Gusset Pouches and Spout Pouches.

It is **Kangopak’s** commitment

* to meet ourobligations
* to produce safe and legally compliant flexible packaging
* to the specified quality, and requirements of our customers.
* to continuously improve the product safety and quality culture.

**Purpose**

• Building symbiotic relationships with all our Stakeholders

• Customer and Sales Driven Company

• Employees to achieve the same goals and direction through shared values generated by Kangopak’s Company Culture

• Kangopak utilises a formalised “Root Cause Analysis” approach to drive the process of ongoing improvement.

**Values**

* We aim to deliver superior Customer service.
* To be an ethical and law-abiding Company.
* The Team is self-critical, reliable and trustworthy
* The Team is respectful of the rights, values and culture of others.
* Create a safe and stable work environment for our employees.
